alert.note: Alert for Henry (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:58PM CDT until June 06 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HENRY COUNTY... At 457 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Morristown, or 9 miles southeast of East Moline, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. At 450 PM, a trained spotter reported quarter sized hail near the Interstate 74 and Interstate 80 interchange. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Geneseo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
